description:
Deeply engaged in battle, Koga warns Ichigo that if he doesn`t back down soon, his life will be snuffed out.  But Ichigo is never one to back down from a challenge...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gray Shadow, The Secret of the Dolls
Haiiro no Kage, Doll no Himitsu
L`ombre grise, le secret des poupées
灰色の影, ドールの秘密
